TopicTitle: KSP Won 2 Unity Awards!!!! Golden Joysticks Voting Still Open: Vote Kerbal Now!!!

Articles.Content:
KSP is up for Golden Joystick awards in multiple categories here: http://www.gamesradar.com/goldenjoystickawards/vote/

Also I understand you can get a digital copy of Bioshock Infinity for a dollar or something, if you are interested in that.

Go Forth and Vote Kerbal!

Note: The Golden Joystick site will ask for an email, name and birthday in order to finish voting.

*Update*

KSP won 2 Unity Awards!!! Way to go Squad & KSP Community!!

Edited September 23, 2015 by The Yellow Dart

Voted for Invisible Inc.

vOv

E: Ugh, Best Mobile Game missing Pixel Dungeon? Suppose it's older than last year...

Also, I haven't heard of or played like, 80% of these games...

Edited September 1, 2015 by regex
I don't know if I can vote Kerbal over Bloodborne... help...

I don't know if I can vote Kerbal over Bloodborne... help...

Think of the children. The children!

Also, I haven't heard of or played like, 80% of these games...

Same there. Maybe they're console-exclusive or something.

I don't know if I can vote Kerbal over Bloodborne... help...

In the Game of the Year category, I saw Cities: Skylines and KSP. It was hard, but KSP took the vote in the end.

I'd like to see KSP win at least one thing.

In the Game of the Year category, I saw Cities: Skylines and KSP. It was hard, but KSP took the vote in the end.

I'd like to see KSP win at least one thing.

I had to vote for it in "ULTIMATE GAME" or whatever that category was, because it was the only one there I recognized.
Votes are cast! Thanks for posting this.

KSP is up for multiple awards here: ow.ly/RDLlV

Go Forth and Vote Kerbal!

Also I understand you can get a digital copy of Bioshock Infinity for a dollar or something, if you are interested in that.

Hi there, you should let people know that by clicking your link you automatically vote for KSP.. Yeah yeah we will most likely all vote for KSP but I feel like my vote was cheated out of me.

Cheers.

Spam-clicking the link now... thanks SOOOO much lol

Yes, you are welcome. You are happy because you knew what would happen when you clicked the link. Thank you for proving my point.

Hi there, you should let people know that by clicking your link you automatically vote for KSP.. Yeah yeah we will most likely all vote for KSP but I feel like my vote was cheated out of me.

Cheers.

Eh? I voted using the exact same link, which I got from Ted's twitter, and I had to manually vote for all twenty-something categories, as the other people above have done, so I'm not sure what you are talking about, but I can post a different link just to make sure.

Edit: Also, that link was actually the one given by the official Golden Joysticks twitter account. Ted just linked to it, so I don't know what you mean. https://twitter.com/GoldenJoysticks

Edited September 1, 2015 by The Yellow Dart
Gave KSP 3 of the 4 categories it was in. Just couldn't compete with Cities: Skylines. That just dominated my thoughts of this year in gaming.

Vote for KSP in categories, ignore all other games (I don't even know them) and then have it ask for name, email, location, and age. Screw this. Sorry KSP, maybe you can win a competition where I don't have to give my social security number and bank account number out to vote.

Vote for KSP in categories, ignore all other games (I don't even know them) and then have it ask for name, email, location, and age. Screw this. Sorry KSP, maybe you can win a competition where I don't have to give my social security number and bank account number out to vote.
It only asked for your name, email, location, and age, not your SSN or bank account number...

It only asked for your name, email, location, and age, not your SSN or bank account number...

Yes, I was being sarcastic.
You ought to have a spam email. Any time I have to give an email and name for something when I don't want to, I give one of my spam emails and a nonsense name.
My name is now Joe Biden, so you might be overreacting MRS.
Voting now! Ugh... On "Best PC Game" there is both KSP and Cites: Skylines... Sorry C:S

Eh? I voted using the exact same link, which I got from Ted's twitter, and I had to manually vote for all twenty-something categories, as the other people above have done, so I'm not sure what you are talking about, but I can post a different link just to make sure.

Edit: Also, that link was actually the one given by the official Golden Joysticks twitter account. Ted just linked to it, so I don't know what you mean. https://twitter.com/GoldenJoysticks

Bwah? I clicked link and immediatly saw a screen saying thank you for voting..

Bwah? I clicked link and immediatly saw a screen saying thank you for voting..

Oh, I think I saw that too. All the voting is on one page. For me It just flashed the "thanks" image for a split second while the page was still loading. Maybe the page got stuck while loading, or your browser had a problem.
If you use script blockers it will do that. You have to enable several things before it starts working.
I voted, gave it a junk email though. I already have Bioshock Infinite.

Vote for KSP in categories, ignore all other games (I don't even know them) and then have it ask for name, email, location, and age. Screw this. Sorry KSP, maybe you can win a competition where I don't have to give my social security number and bank account number out to vote.

Sorry, I was just was feeling a bit annoyed. Ah well, just think of me as someone who isn't voting for another game.
I voted Kerbal for everything. And Halo/random for everything else.
All voted. I looked and looked for Kerbal 2 for most Anticipated. I guess Jeb flew off with it.
